name: Locale
description: Internationalization (Locale) utility for managing localized strings. Supports single-level (non-recursive) language fallbacks and automatic UI language detection.

staticFields.label: CurrentLanguage
staticFields.description: Returns the current language (e.g. "English" or "简体中文").

staticFields.label: DefaultLanguage
staticFields.description: The default language to use when a string is not found in the current language pack. English by default. Refer to LanguageEnum

staticMethods.label: Get
staticMethods.description: Get the localized string for the given key. Searches the current UI language, then any registered fallbacks, and finally the default language. Throws an exception if the key is not found in any language pack.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the localized string to get.

staticMethods.label: Set
staticMethods.description: Set or override a localized string for the specified language and key.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language code. Refer to LanguageEnum

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the localized string.

staticMethods.label: RegisterLanguage
staticMethods.description: Register a single-level (non-recursive) fallback: if a string is not found in 'fromLanguage', the system will search only in 'toLanguage', without chaining further.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language code to register. Refer to LanguageEnum

parameters.name: strings
parameters.description: The dictionary containing key-value pairs of localized strings.

staticMethods.label: RegisterLanguages
staticMethods.description: Register all localized strings from JSON files for a specific category across all available languages. Use 'internal://' prefix for internal files (e.g., 'internal://BasicTutorialMap') or no prefix for external files (e.g., 'MyCustomMod').

parameters.name: pattern
parameters.description: The category pattern. Use 'internal://' prefix for internal files or no prefix for external files.

staticMethods.label: RegisterFallback
staticMethods.description: Register a fallback language. When a string is not found in 'fromLanguage', it will try 'toLanguage'.

parameters.name: fromLanguage
parameters.description: The language code that will fallback to another language. Refer to LanguageEnum

parameters.name: toLanguage
parameters.description: The language code to fallback to. Refer to LanguageEnum

parameters.name: fromLanguage
parameters.description: The language code to remove the fallback for. Refer to LanguageEnum
